hha-meem
tanzīlu al-kitābi mina al-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥakīmi
inna fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi laāyātin lil'mu'minīna
wafī khalqikum wamā yabuthu min dābbatin āyātun liqawmin yūqinūna
wa-ikh'tilāfi al-layli wal-nahāri wamā anzala al-lahu mina al-samāi min riz'qin fa-aḥyā bihi al-arḍa baʿda mawtihā wataṣrīfi al-riyāḥi āyātun liqawmin yaʿqilūna
til'ka āyātu al-lahi natlūhā ʿalayka bil-ḥaqi fabi-ayyi ḥadīthin baʿda al-lahi waāyātihi yu'minūna
waylun likulli affākin athīmin
yasmaʿu āyāti al-lahi tut'lā ʿalayhi thumma yuṣirru mus'takbiran ka-an lam yasmaʿhā fabashir'hu biʿadhābin alīmin
wa-idhā ʿalima min āyātinā shayan ittakhadhahā huzuwan ulāika lahum ʿadhābun muhīnun
min warāihim jahannamu walā yugh'nī ʿanhum mā kasabū shayan walā mā ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi awliyāa walahum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
hādhā hudan wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyāti rabbihim lahum ʿadhābun min rij'zin alīmun
al-lahu alladhī sakhara lakumu al-baḥra litajriya al-ful'ku fīhi bi-amrihi walitabtaghū min faḍlihi walaʿallakum tashkurūna
wasakhara lakum mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi jamīʿan min'hu inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yatafakkarūna
qul lilladhīna āmanū yaghfirū lilladhīna lā yarjūna ayyāma al-lahi liyajziya qawman bimā kānū yaksibūna
man ʿamila ṣāliḥan falinafsihi waman asāa faʿalayhā thumma ilā rabbikum tur'jaʿūna
walaqad ātaynā banī is'rāīla al-kitāba wal-ḥuk'ma wal-nubuwata warazaqnāhum mina al-ṭayibāti wafaḍḍalnāhum ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
waātaynāhum bayyinātin mina al-amri famā ikh'talafū illā min baʿdi mā jāahumu al-ʿil'mu baghyan baynahum inna rabbaka yaqḍī baynahum yawma al-qiyāmati fīmā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūna
thumma jaʿalnāka ʿalā sharīʿatin mina al-amri fa-ittabiʿ'hā walā tattabiʿ ahwāa alladhīna lā yaʿlamūna
innahum lan yugh'nū ʿanka mina al-lahi shayan wa-inna al-ẓālimīna baʿḍuhum awliyāu baʿḍin wal-lahu waliyyu al-mutaqīna
hādhā baṣāiru lilnnāsi wahudan waraḥmatun liqawmin yūqinūna
am ḥasiba alladhīna ij'taraḥū al-sayiāti an najʿalahum ka-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti sawāan maḥyāhum wamamātuhum sāa mā yaḥkumūna
wakhalaqa al-lahu al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqi walituj'zā kullu nafsin bimā kasabat wahum lā yuẓ'lamūna
afara-ayta mani ittakhadha ilāhahu hawāhu wa-aḍallahu al-lahu ʿalā ʿil'min wakhatama ʿalā samʿihi waqalbihi wajaʿala ʿalā baṣarihi ghishāwatan faman yahdīhi min baʿdi al-lahi afalā tadhakkarūna
waqālū mā hiya illā ḥayātunā al-dun'yā namūtu wanaḥyā wamā yuh'likunā illā al-dahru wamā lahum bidhālika min ʿil'min in hum illā yaẓunnūna
wa-idhā tut'lā ʿalayhim āyātunā bayyinātin mā kāna ḥujjatahum illā an qālū i'tū biābāinā in kuntum ṣādiqīna
quli al-lahu yuḥ'yīkum thumma yumītukum thumma yajmaʿukum ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati lā rayba fīhi walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wayawma taqūmu al-sāʿatu yawma-idhin yakhsaru al-mub'ṭilūna
watarā kulla ummatin jāthiyatan kullu ummatin tud'ʿā ilā kitābihā al-yawma tuj'zawna mā kuntum taʿmalūna
hādhā kitābunā yanṭiqu ʿalaykum bil-ḥaqi innā kunnā nastansikhu mā kuntum taʿmalūna
fa-ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fayud'khiluhum rabbuhum fī raḥmatihi dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-mubīnu
wa-ammā alladhīna kafarū afalam takun āyātī tut'lā ʿalaykum fa-is'takbartum wakuntum qawman muj'rimīna
wa-idhā qīla inna waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqun wal-sāʿatu lā rayba fīhā qul'tum mā nadrī mā al-sāʿatu in naẓunnu illā ẓannan wamā naḥnu bimus'tayqinīna
wabadā lahum sayyiātu mā ʿamilū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahziūna
waqīla al-yawma nansākum kamā nasītum liqāa yawmikum hādhā wamawākumu al-nāru wamā lakum min nāṣirīna
dhālikum bi-annakumu ittakhadhtum āyāti al-lahi huzuwan wagharratkumu al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā fal-yawma lā yukh'rajūna min'hā walā hum yus'taʿtabūna
falillahi al-ḥamdu rabbi al-samāwāti warabbi al-arḍi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
walahu al-kib'riyāu fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
